text: Eckart Höfling (28 October 1936 - 1 March 2014) was a German Catholic priest. He was best known for working in the fight against poverty in Brazil. He was born in Langenprozelten, Lower Franconia. Höfling died after a long illness on 1 March 2014 in Main-Spessart, Bavaria. He was 77 years old. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2014 deaths Category:German Roman Catholic priests
title: Eckart Höfling
